bookSeries: Alfred Hitchcock and The Three Investigators #1
Plot: Finding a genuine haunted house for a movie set sounds like fun -- and a great way to generate publicity for the Three Investigators' new detective agency. But when the boys arrive for an overnight visit at Terror Castle -- home of a deceased horror-movie actor -- they soon find out how the place got its name!
Characters: Jupiter Jones, Peter Crenshaw, Bob Andrews
Setting: United States of America, Los Angeles, California (United States)
